SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.application.controller

Class AddEntryAgendaController

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.g312.application.controller.AddEntryAgendaController
public class AddEntryAgendaController extends Object
This class implements the controller for the "Add Entry Agenda" functionality. It interacts with GreenSpaceRepository, TaskRepository, and AuthenticationRepository to manage tasks and green spaces within the agenda.

    • AddEntryAgendaController

      public AddEntryAgendaController()

  • Method Details

    • getAuthRepository

      public void getAuthRepository()
      Retrieves the AuthenticationRepository instance from Repositories. This method ensures a single instance of the repository is used throughout the controller.

    • getUserEmail

      public String getUserEmail()
      Retrieves the current user's email address from the AuthenticationRepository.
      Returns:
      The current user's email address if successful, null otherwise.

    • getGreenSpaces

      public List<GreenSpace> getGreenSpaces()
      Retrieves a list of green spaces.
      Returns:
      a list of GreenSpace objects representing the green spaces

    • getTasksByGreenSpace

      public List<Task> getTasksByGreenSpace(GreenSpace greenSpace)
      Retrieves a list of tasks associated with a specific green space.
      Parameters:
      greenSpace - the GreenSpace for which to retrieve tasks
      Returns:
      a list of Task objects associated with the specified green space

    • getGreenSpaceList

      public List<GreenSpace> getGreenSpaceList(String userEmail)
      Retrieves a list of green spaces managed by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - the email of the user managing the green spaces
      Returns:
      a list of GreenSpace objects managed by the specified user, or an empty list if the user is not logged in or if there are no green spaces managed by the user

    • filterGreenSpacesByManager

      public List<GreenSpace> filterGreenSpacesByManager(List<GreenSpace> greenSpaces, String managerName)
      Filters a list of green spaces based on the provided manager name. This method iterates through the green spaces and checks if their manager name (case-insensitively) matches the provided name. Matching green spaces are added to a new list and returned.
      Parameters:
      greenSpaces - The list of GreenSpace objects to filter.
      managerName - The name of the manager to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of GreenSpace objects managed by the specified manager (empty list if no matches are found).

    • addTaskToAgenda

      public void addTaskToAgenda(Task selectedTask, LocalDate startDate, LocalTime startTime)
      Adds a task to the agenda on the specified date and time.
      Parameters:
      selectedTask - the task to be added to the agenda
      startDate - the date on which the task is to be scheduled
      startTime - the time at which the task is to start
